thread.title: Oman- Financials weigh down benchmark index
thread.title_full: Oman- Financials weigh down benchmark index | MENAFN.COM

author: Muscat Daily
title: Oman- Financials weigh down benchmark index
text:
(MENAFN - Muscat Daily) The seven-day rally on the Muscat bourse ended on Sunday with the benchmark 30-share index losing 0.14 per cent to close at 6581.82 on pressure from financials.  However market activity improved with trading volumes and turnover jumping 46.84 per cent and 59.41 per cent to 10.8mn shares and RO2.78mn.
The Financial and Industrial sub-indices fell 0.60 per cent and 0.09 per cent to 8110.15 and 8329.1 while the Services gauge closed stable at 3528.52. The MSM Shariah index closed down 0.12 per cent at 992.41.
Market breadth was negative with 15 stocks closing lower against four gainers. Oman United Insurance (2.56%) National Bank of Oman (1.13%) and Bank Muscat Conv Bonds 4.5% (0.94%) were among the top gainers. Al Madina Takaful Bank Nizwa and HSBC Bank Oman were among the top laggards.
By special arrangement with Oman Arab Bank - Investment Management Group
